thread.title: Would definitely stay again
thread.title_full: Would definitely stay again - Review of Relais Hotel du Vieux Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: KirkRo
title: Would definitely stay again
text: Quiet street, historical building with charm, good value for the money, hot shower, close to the action. What else do you want? The staff was very congenial and helpful, particularly Henri, who helped track down a bag that Air France had lost. The elevator is the size of a child's coffin but so what? I can fit with my luggage even without sucking in my American gut!
